Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: விளியுமென் இன்னுயிர் வேறல்லம் என்பார்அளியின்மை ஆற்ற நினைந்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Dear life departs, when his ungracious deeds I ponder o'er, Who said erewhile, 'We're one for evermore'.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A woman's life force ('Innuyir') is depicted as a beautiful, glowing flower that is rapidly wilting and dying ('Viliyum').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The cause of the wilting is her memory. A thought bubble shows her lover speaking the words 'நாம் வேறல்லம்' ('Naam Verallam' - We are not separate), but his present actions are shown to be cruel and ungracious ('Aliyinmai').
Layered_Composition.Background: The stark contrast between his past words of unity and his present cruelty is the poison that is killing the flower of her life. The background is a barren wasteland of broken promises.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: My life is dying as I constantly remember the cruelty of the man who once promised we were one and inseparable.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The life force as a wilting flower is the central metaphor. The memory of his hypocritical words acts as a visible poison affecting the flower.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Heartbreaking, tragic, a sense of betrayal.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The flower is losing its light and color, fading from vibrant to a deathly pale. The memory is lit with a harsh, revealing light that exposes the hypocrisy. The palette is dominated by decaying, sickly colors.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A close-up on the wilting flower, with the painful memory reflected on its fading petals.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, symbolic realism, with detailed textures of the dying flower.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dramatic, low-key lighting that emphasizes the process of dying.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Dark romanticism, with a focus on the tragedy of betrayal.

Cultural_Anchors: The sanctity of the promise of unity (நாம் வேறல்லம்)
The pain of hypocrisy in love

Negative_Prompt: a blooming flower, a kind lover, a happy memory, text artifacts, cartoonish, blurry.
